name: Indeep | The casual dungeon crawler
description: Play this casual classical dungeon crawler anytime and anywhere and save your progress for later. The dungeon is waiting for you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GPU with 512 MB Video RAM
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Dual Core Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GPU with 1 GB Video RAM
